mapper.select: select count(*) from match where to_char(match_day,'yyyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(sysdate,'yyyyy/mm/dd')

select MATCH_CODE,HOME_CODE,AWAY_CODE, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'YYYY')) MATCH_YEAR, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'MM')) MATCH_MONTH, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'DD')) MATCH_DAY, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'HH')) MATCH_HOUR, RESULT from match where to_char(match_day,'yyyyy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyyy/mm/dd')

select r_num, MATCH_CODE,HOME_CODE,AWAY_CODE, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'YYYY')) MATCH_YEAR, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'MM')) MATCH_MONTH, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'DD')) MATCH_DAY, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'HH')) MATCH_HOUR, RESULT from (select rownum as r_num, a.* from (select * from match where to_char(match_day,'yyyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(sysdate,'yyyyy/mm/dd') and RESULT is null order by match_day desc) a)

select r_num, MATCH_CODE,HOME_CODE,AWAY_CODE, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'YYYY')) MATCH_YEAR, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'MM')) MATCH_MONTH, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'DD')) MATCH_DAY, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'HH')) MATCH_HOUR, RESULT from (select rownum as r_num, a.* from (select * from match where to_char(match_day,'yyyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(sysdate,'yyyyy/mm/dd') order by match_code desc) a) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}

select MATCH_CODE,HOME_CODE,AWAY_CODE, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'YYYY')) MATCH_YEAR, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'MM')) MATCH_MONTH, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'DD')) MATCH_DAY, to_number(to_char(MATCH_DAY,'HH')) MATCH_HOUR from match order by match_code desc
